mapper.select: SELECT RC_ID,NUMBER,NAME FROM t_ftts_rc WHERE RESOURCE_ROOM_ID IN (SELECT RESOURCE_ROOM_ID FROM t_resource_room WHERE RESOURCE_STATION_ID=${stationId})

mapper.insert: insert into t_ftts_connect (STATION_ID, A_END_ID, Z_END_ID, CONN_TYPE, NOTE)values( #{map.STATION_ID}, #{map.A_END_ID}, #{map.Z_END_ID}, #{map.CONN_TYPE}, #{map.NOTE} )
